# startIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the initial element in the column.

## Declaration

```swift
var startIndex: Int { get }
```

## Retrieving an Index

- **endIndex**: The index of the final element in the column.
- **index(before:)**: Returns the index immediately before an element index.
- **index(after:)**: Returns the index immediately after an element index.
